TITLE: Trump tariffs on China will soon bring 'irreversible' damage to many American businesses
SUMMARY: Apple's iPhone and other tech got a reprieve from Trump's China tariffs policy, but most businesses will soon face 'irreversible' damage from the trade war.

TITLE: Trump tariffs will lead to abandoned freight at ports as cash-strapped businesses reject orders
SUMMARY: With tariffs set to rise exponentially for U.S. businesses that import, many shipments may be stranded at ports by cash-strapped owners.

TITLE: Trump’s Canadian tariffs are having a chilling effect on Vermont’s small business owners
SUMMARY: The Green Mountain State's small businesses are getting caught in the tariff crossfire between the United States and Canada.

TITLE: Meta is targeting 'hundreds of millions' of businesses in agentic AI deployment
SUMMARY: Meta expects a market of hundreds of millions of small businesses where gen AI will directly interact with customers, says head of AI for Business, Clara Shih.

TITLE: Treasury Department suspends enforcement of ownership information reporting for millions of businesses
SUMMARY: The Treasury Department has halted enforcement of beneficial ownership information, or BOI, reporting for millions of businesses.

TITLE: In wake of Southern California wildfires, a diverse small business community looks to rebuild
SUMMARY: Business owners in Altadena hope to see the diverse community that their organizations thrived in rise from the ashes.

TITLE: Treasury sets March 21 deadline for millions of businesses to report ownership information or risk fines of $10,000 or more
SUMMARY: The Treasury Department set a March 21 deadline to report "beneficial ownership information" after a Texas court lifted a block on enforcement.

TITLE: Op-ed: Amid DEI retreat, America's small businesses are not caving like big corporations
SUMMARY: A CNBC|SurveyMonkey study finds small businesses continue to support diversity, equity and inclusion efforts even as political scrutiny intensifies.

TITLE: AI is moving inside the operations, and behind the CEO desk, at America's small businesses
SUMMARY: More small businesses are leveraging generative artificial intelligence to give them an edge when it comes to hiring the best talent.

TITLE: Treasury delays deadline for small businesses to file new form to avoid risk of fines for noncompliance
SUMMARY: The Treasury delayed a Jan. 1 deadline to file a new "beneficial ownership information" report to Jan. 13 following a recent court order.

TITLE: Middle school students in Utah are being taught to pitch like Shark Tank entrepreneurs
SUMMARY: Middle school students in Salt Lake City participate in a Shark Tank-inspired competition to pitch their start-up ideas to business leaders in Utah.

TITLE: In Salt Lake City, women business owners are pushing boundaries and breaking barriers
SUMMARY: Fewer than 15% of businesses in Salt Lake City are owned by women, but female founders are pioneering ways forward.

TITLE: Treasury Department may fine small businesses $10,000 or more if they don't file this new report
SUMMARY: The Corporate Transparency Act requires many businesses to file data about their "beneficial owners" by Jan. 1. But the rule is being challenged in court.

TITLE: Post-election Main Street bump: Confidence surges among small business owners
SUMMARY: Small business owner sentiment surges after election, with a heavy partisan component to the outlook, from taxes to trade, regulation and sales expectations.

TITLE: Harris campaign launches small business battleground tour in a play for Latino, Black voters
SUMMARY: The Harris campaign will announce the new campaign tour hours before her VP pick, Gov. Tim Walz, debates Trump's running mate, Sen. JD Vance.

TITLE: Op-ed: Just like the rest of the nation, America's small businesses are at a crossroads
SUMMARY: As the presidential election nears, small business owners are cautiously optimistic, despite cost concerns, a CNBC|SurveyMonkey study finds.

TITLE: Small business owners turn more bullish amid Fed interest rate cuts: CNBC survey
SUMMARY: The Federal Reserve's decision to cut interest rates leads to greater confidence among small business owners, many of whom say they will increase investment.

TITLE: Democrats grant special convention access to more than 200 content creators
SUMMARY: More than 200 content creators are attending the Democratic National Convention in Chicago to make content supporting Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign.

TITLE: The end of this tax break could be 'very disruptive' to business owners, expert says — what to know
SUMMARY: The qualified business income deduction could expire after 2025 without changes from Congress. Here's what to know.

TITLE: IRS to reject billions of dollars in ‘improper’ pandemic-era small business tax credit claims
SUMMARY: The IRS will deny billions of dollars' worth of improper employee retention credit claims. Here's what small businesses need to know.

TITLE: These groups help people of color and the LGBTQ+ community find a ‘radically inclusive space’ in the outdoors
SUMMARY: Nonprofits such as Hoods to Woods, Edge Outdoors and Unlikely Riders are dedicated to creating communities in the outdoors for marginalized people.

TITLE: Treasury, IRS unveil plan to close ‘major tax loophole’ used by large partnerships
SUMMARY: The Treasury Department and the IRS on Monday unveiled a plan to "close a major tax loophole" used by large, complex partnerships.

TITLE: The SBA is unveiling new credit lines of up to $5 million to fund small businesses
SUMMARY: The project is part of the SBA's efforts to broaden its flagship lending program for American small businesses under Administrator Isabel Casillas Guzman.

TITLE: Why half of all workers may struggle to get weight-loss drug health insurance coverage
SUMMARY: Small businesses employ half of American workers but the jobs often lack the health insurance coverage that big corporations offer, including weight loss drugs.

TITLE: You could score a tax break for hiring your own kids this summer — if you follow the rules
SUMMARY: Hiring your kids can offer tax benefits if you're self-employed. But first, you need to understand your state and federal labor and tax laws.

TITLE: How Baked by Melissa's founder turned a tiny New York City apartment kitchen business into a cupcake empire
SUMMARY: Baked by Melissa founder Melissa Ben-Ishay explains how she built her cupcake empire from subway order dashing to a following of millions on social media.

TITLE: Inflation fears among America's small businesses are rising again and their faith in the Fed is falling
SUMMARY: Small business owners say the economy is doing okay, but their inflation fears are rising again while their faith in the Fed is dropping.

TITLE: It's been a great run for Wall Street, but Main Street is feeling left out
SUMMARY: Small business owners across the country say a 2024 economy and stock market that have been chugging along have left them behind.

TITLE: Successful start-up founders offer advice for aspiring entrepreneurs: 'Embrace what makes you different'
SUMMARY: Successful start-up founders offer advice for aspiring entrepreneurs.

TITLE: Small business optimism hits 11-year low as inflation fears won't go away
SUMMARY: The NFIB's survey showed a reading of 88.5, down nearly a point from February to the lowest since December 2012.
